text: Charles Francis "Chuck" Dolan (October 16, 1926 - December 28, 2024) was an American billionaire. He was the founder of Cablevision. Dolan's business controls AMC Networks, MSG Networks, and The Madison Square Garden Company, which at one point were all part of Cablevision itself. Dolan died on December 28, 2024, at the age of 98. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American billionaires Category:Businesspeople from Cleveland
title: Charles Dolan
